DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study test efficacy memantine , noncompetitive NMDA receptor antagonist , reduce early attrition improve outcome opioid-dependent individual maintain naltrexone . This double-blind , 12-week trial include heroin-dependent patient complete detoxification . Participants randomly assign one three condition : naltrexone placebo , naltrexone memantine ( 15 mg bid ) , naltrexone memantine ( 30 mg bid ) . Naltrexone take 3 time week clinic , memantine placebo take home . In addition , twice week patient receive psychosocial intervention include motivational interview cognitive-behavioral relapse prevention . The goal psychosocial intervention improve compliance medication maintain abstinence . Baseline assessments take compare complete study visit , occur 3 time week .
